text:
easee.online | Front-end engineer | Full-time | Amsterdam, The Netherlands | ONSITE | https://easee.online

easee is an eye exam for the 21st century. You can get a prescription for glasses or contact lenses anywhere, at any time, using just a smartphone, a computer screen and 3m/9ft of space.

We just raised a significant seed round and partnered with Ace & Tate (the Warby Parker of Europe). We are a team of 8 of which 4 developers and currently busy retooling from Laravel & jquery to Vue.js & python. We plan to expand to other countries in Europe and to develop new eye testing methodologies and other products besides prescriptions.

As a front-end engineer your main tasks will be building a great user experience that will work for a huge population.

I joined two months ago as CTO. E-mail me at jouke @ domain to apply or ask questions.
